definition: suffix of a noun of locality
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: As far as I know, there is no such "face-off" between China and India in the border area.
sentences.chinese: 據我瞭解，中印邊境地區目前不存在“對峙”情況。

sentences.english: The road will connect the border areas of the land-locked state.
sentences.chinese: 公路將把這個內陸邦的邊境地區連接起來。

sentences.english: Enemy troops raided our border areas.
sentences.chinese: 敵軍對我邊境地區進行襲擊。

sentences.english: There are also many records of trade at the Chinese border in ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 中國古代在邊境地區也有大量貨殖的紀錄。

sentences.english: Travel restrictions, especially near the Chinese border, were reimposed.
sentences.chinese: 其次，加強旅行限制，尤其是在靠近中國邊境地區。

sentences.english: Borderers' trade is a common economic activity in border areas.
sentences.chinese: 邊民互市是邊境地區常見的經濟貿易活動。

sentences.english: Canadian population mainly concentrated along the southern border.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大人口主要聚集茌南部邊境地區。

sentences.english: Village is located in Daxin county in Chinese frontier region of Guangxi.
sentences.chinese: 村是位於中國廣西邊境地區大新縣的一個村莊。

sentences.english: Cambodia hopes the UN will send troops to the border area.
sentences.chinese: 柬埔寨方面提出希聯合國向柬泰邊境地區派兵。

sentences.english: They ran a blockade and got to the border.
sentences.chinese: 他們闖過封鎖線來到邊境地區。

definition: 38th parallel, forming the DMZ border between North and South Korea
to evacuate (e.g. foreign civilians from a war zone)
East Turkestan Liberation Organization (ETLO), Chinese dissident group/abbr. for 東突厥斯坦解放組織|东突厥斯坦解放组织
